# Revision Analysis {.unnumbered #a-revs}

## In this Chapter

We will cover how analyse the behaviour of revisions, typically on frequently published (and revised) macro-economice indicators.

## Tools for access

The [rjd3revsions](https://github.com/rjdemetra/rjd3revisions) allows to perform revision analysis.

More information is available directly in the package documentation and vignette.
